item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! I am Thomas a DevOps from Buenos Aires, Argentina mainly focused on Kubernetes. I have proven experience designing and implementing production-grade clusters. Aside from my DevOps work, I used to be a fullstack developer (AngularJS + Ruby on Rails) and I am close to finishing my computer science degree at the University of Buenos Aires (UBA). On my off-time, I play football (soccer in the US) and I try to contribute to Kubernetes related open source projects such as cluster-api.

item.title: How I helped Shipnow
item.description: Shipnow is an Argentinean startup and, since its inception in 2014, it has simplified the shipment process of more than 300 clients. Shipnow takes the responsibility away from sellers of having to handle complex shipments across the whole country for each of their products. Through a simple yet fully featured web application and seamless integrations all major e-commerce platforms, clients can take their minds off shipment intricacies and focus on what they do best: selling.
